channel.title: 轮完本子轮三哥：阿川钦定印度已经不是发展中国家
channel.description: 轮完本子轮三哥：阿川钦定印度已经不是发展中国家

item.title: 轮完本子轮三哥：阿川钦定印度已经不是发展中国家[0-50]
item.description:
轮完本子轮三哥：阿川钦定印度已经不是发展中国家 India, China no longer ‘developing nations’, won’t let them take WTO ‘advantage’: Trump
On Tuesday, addressing a gathering at Pennsylvania, Trump said India and China— the two economic giants from Asia— are no longer developing nations and as such they cannot take the benefit from the WTO.
Trump has always championed his ‘America First’ policy and has been a vocal critic of India for levying “tremendously high” duties on US products and has described the country as a “tariff king”.
Asserting that India and China have “already grown” and it was unfair of them to take advantage of the “developing countries” tag by the World Trade Organisation (WTO), US President Donald Trump said he would not let it happen anymore. He expressed hope that WTO will treat the US “fairly”.
Advertising
On Tuesday, addressing a gathering at Pennsylvania, Trump said India and China— the two economic giants from Asia— are no longer developing nations and as such they cannot take the benefit from the WTO. “They (India and China) were taking advantage of us for years and years,” he said, pointing out that WTO’s ‘developing nation’ tag for India and China put the US to disadvantage.
链接在：
https://indianexpress.com/article/world/india-china-advantage-developing-nations-tag-wto-trump-tariffs-5904775/
当巨魔是真的爽
所以说印度人来看这句话算不算喜事？
item.content:encoded:
寒灯独夜人:
轮完本子轮三哥：阿川钦定印度已经不是发展中国家
India, China no longer ‘developing nations’, won’t let them take WTO ‘advantage’: Trump
On Tuesday, addressing a gathering at Pennsylvania, Trump said India and China— the two economic giants from Asia— are no longer developing nations and as such they cannot take the benefit from the WTO.
Trump has always championed his ‘America First’ policy and has been a vocal critic of India for levying “tremendously high” duties on US products and has described the country as a “tariff king”.
Asserting that India and China have “already grown” and it was unfair of them to take advantage of the “developing countries” tag by the World Trade Organisation (WTO), US President Donald Trump said he would not let it happen anymore. He expressed hope that WTO will treat the US “fairly”.
Advertising
On Tuesday, addressing a gathering at Pennsylvania, Trump said India and China— the two economic giants from Asia— are no longer developing nations and as such they cannot take the benefit from the WTO. “They (India and China) were taking advantage of us for years and years,” he said, pointing out that WTO’s ‘developing nation’ tag for India and China put the US to disadvantage.
链接在：
https://indianexpress.com/article/world/india-china-advantage-developing-nations-tag-wto-trump-tariffs-5904775/
当巨魔是真的爽
所以说印度人来看这句话算不算喜事？

东方永鵺抄:
remove kebab, hindi 强大

lexi:
Jai hind! India ok!

quadrozeke:
“正是在磨地机的领导下，印度才获得了美国的承认！国大党贪污腐败的官僚们根本不可能做到这些！JAI HIND！”

烤烤鱼ω:
大震惊！川皇不得不承认印度已经是发达国家！

pk5980:
Jai Hind！

于若白:
真是娱乐新闻
—— 来自 vivo NEX S, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

klsh2017:
原来国家元首和外国大使吃一顿饭可以毁掉外交部一年的工作努力
现在有了互联网，国家元首只需要发一条推特就能做到了

天气雨:

—— 来自 Xiaomi MI 8, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

天网:
本帖最后由 天网 于 2019-8-14 20:53 编辑
天气雨 发表于 2019-8-14 20:43
以三哥的性格肯定觉得这是好事
—— 来自 Xiaomi MI 8, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2 ...
看来是了。搜了下这个新闻，全都是印度的报道
timesofindia.indiatimes.com
economictimes.indiatimes.com
www.ndtv.com
www.hindustantimes.com
www.thestatesman.com
我目前还没找到非印度的消息源
最搞笑的是，上面所有的消息里，关于两个国家并列出现的先后顺序，india永远在china的前面

sagajytc:
没毛病，你看随便一个阿三都是科技企业的高管，肯定已经迈入高收入群体了啊，还赚的是美国人钱，这种肥羊不宰对得起红脖子吗？

klsh2017:

没毛病，你看随便一个阿三都是科技企业的高管，肯定已经迈入高收入群体了啊，还赚的是美国人钱，这种肥羊不 ...
主要中国移民都是拼命从中国捞钱送到美国，阿三移民拼命从美国捞钱寄回印度，这不忠诚。阿三对外贸易一直逆差，外汇全靠侨民的汇款回寄保持平衡

佐塚間桐:

易方世界:

烂掉蛇:

H5N1:
看了一种说法，川总搞这贸易战，无非也就想收点税，弥补一下之前减税的损失，
说开了，普增个10%，中国也能接受，只要是全世界都加就好了。
当然，其他人也有自己的私货。

2736:
